languages.text:
{n}Ирлиэт переводит взгляд на вас. В этом взгляде — ни единого чувства, ни грамма жизни или тепла, которое вы ловили прежде.{/n}
"Ты наблюдател{mf|ен|ьна}, элантах. Необычно. Но не испытывай свой разум догадками — я довольно изливала тебе свои вышедшие из-под контроля чувства. Я вновь контролирую себя".

{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."
languages.original_text:
{n}Ирлиэт переводит взгляд на вас. В этом взгляде — ни единого чувства, ни грамма жизни или тепла, которое вы ловили прежде.{/n}
"Ты наблюдател{mf|ен|ьна}, элантах. Необычно. Но не испытывай свой разум догадками — я довольно изливала тебе свои вышедшие из-под контроля чувства. Я вновь контролирую себя".

traits.locale_text:
{n}Yrliet turns her gaze to you — not a single emotion, nor an ounce of life or the warmth that you had previously seen in it.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to test your mind with conjectures. I have had poured enough of my uncontrolled feelings at you, but I am in control again."

{n}Yrliet turns her gaze to you — not a single emotion, nor an ounce of life or the warmth that you had previously seen in it.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to test your mind with conjectures. I have had poured enough of my uncontrolled feelings at you, but I am in control again."

{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."

{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."

{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特将目光转向你，那双无情的眼眸已经失去了你熟悉的活力与温暖。{/n}“你的观察力很不错，外界人，真了不起。不过你不必再费心揣摩，我已经在你身上倾注了过分的热情，是时候悬崖勒马了。”
languages.original_text:
{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特将目光转向你，那双无情的眼眸已经失去了你熟悉的活力与温暖。{/n}“你的观察力很不错，外界人，真了不起。不过你不必再费心揣摩，我已经在你身上倾注了过分的热情，是时候悬崖勒马了。”

languages.text:
{n}Yrliet te mira con los ojos desprovistos de toda emoción, vitalidad y calidez que antes vieras en ellos.{/n}
«Eres perspicaz, elantach. Qué inusitado. Pero no hay necesidad de atribular tu mente con conjeturas. He dejado que mis sentimientos desbocados te afecten, pero ya vuelvo a tener el control».
languages.original_text:
{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Yrliet te mira con los ojos desprovistos de toda emoción, vitalidad y calidez que antes vieras en ellos.{/n}
«Eres perspicaz, elantach. Qué inusitado. Pero no hay necesidad de atribular tu mente con conjeturas. He dejado que mis sentimientos desbocados te afecten, pero ya vuelvo a tener el control».

languages.text:
{n}Yrliet vous fixe d'un regard dénué de toute émotion. Vous ne décelez plus la moindre trace de vie et de chaleur que vous trouviez auparavant dans ses yeux.{/n}
« Vous êtes perspicace, elantach, contrairement à d'habitude. Mais inutile de vous perdre en conjectures. J'avais trop laissé libre cours à mes sentiments à votre encontre, et j'ai à présent repris le contrôle sur eux. »
languages.original_text:
{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Yrliet vous fixe d'un regard dénué de toute émotion. Vous ne décelez plus la moindre trace de vie et de chaleur que vous trouviez auparavant dans ses yeux.{/n}
« Vous êtes perspicace, elantach, contrairement à d'habitude. Mais inutile de vous perdre en conjectures. J'avais trop laissé libre cours à mes sentiments à votre encontre, et j'ai à présent repris le contrôle sur eux. »

languages.text:
{n}Yrliet sieht dich an – völlig emotionslos, ohne jeden Hauch von Leben und Wärme, die du bislang immer gespürt hast.{/n}
"Gut beobachtet, Elantach. Wie ungewöhnlich! Aber gebt Euch keine Mühe mit Hypothesen. Ich habe Euch schon genug meiner Gefühle aufgezwungen, aber jetzt habe ich wieder alles unter Kontrolle."
languages.original_text:
{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Yrliet sieht dich an – völlig emotionslos, ohne jeden Hauch von Leben und Wärme, die du bislang immer gespürt hast.{/n}
"Gut beobachtet, Elantach. Wie ungewöhnlich! Aber gebt Euch keine Mühe mit Hypothesen. Ich habe Euch schon genug meiner Gefühle aufgezwungen, aber jetzt habe ich wieder alles unter Kontrolle."

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはあなたを見つめる。彼女の目には、以前あなたが見ていたような感情も、生気や温かみのかけらもない。{/n}「よく観察しているな、エランタよ。珍しいこともあるものだ。だが、憶測で頭を悩ませる必要はない。あなたには抑えきれない感情を十分に押し付けてしまったが、再び制御しているから」
languages.original_text:
{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはあなたを見つめる。彼女の目には、以前あなたが見ていたような感情も、生気や温かみのかけらもない。{/n}「よく観察しているな、エランタよ。珍しいこともあるものだ。だが、憶測で頭を悩ませる必要はない。あなたには抑えきれない感情を十分に押し付けてしまったが、再び制御しているから」

languages.text:
{n}Yrliet sana bakıyor. Gözlerinde önceden gördüğün hiçbir duygu, hiçbir yaşam belirtisi ve sıcaklık artık orada değil.{/n}
"İyi bir gözlem elantach. Alışkın değilim. Varsayımlarla aklını bulandırmana gerek yok. Duygularımı yeterince ölçüsüz bir biçimde sırtına yükledim ama artık yeniden kontrol altına almayı başardım."
languages.original_text:
{n}Yrliet looks at you — her eyes devoid of every emotion, every shred of life and warmth that you previously beheld in them.{/n}
"You are observant, elantach. How unusual. But there is no need to trouble your mind with conjecture. I have inflicted enough of my unbridled feelings upon you, but I am in control again."
